hero.title: Help Save Lives in Syria
hero.subtitle: Your donation directly funds critical medical care for those who need it most. Join us in providing hope and healing to Syrian families affected by crisis.
hero.joinedDonors: donors who've already made a difference

cases.title: Current Medical Cases
cases.subtitle: These individuals and communities urgently need medical assistance. Your contribution can make the difference between life and death.

about.title: About Us
about.missionText: SyriaHealthcare.com connects donors and health professionals to deliver vital medical assistance to those affected by the crisis in Syria. We ensure your donations go directly to lifesaving care.
about.whoWeAreText: Our team is a coalition of Syrian and international volunteers, medical workers, tech specialists, and advocates, working transparently to maximize the impact of every donation.

donate.title: Donate to This Case
donate.note: After sending your donation, please email a copy of your transaction to donations@syriahealthcare.com to help us verify and track your contribution.
donate.trackingDesc: Follow your donation's impact with regular updates
donate.secureDesc: Fully encrypted transactions and data protection
donate.taxDeductibleDesc: Donations eligible for tax deduction in many countries

notFound.description: We can't seem to find the page you're looking for. Let's get you back to where you can make a difference.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from those who have been helped by your generous contributions and the difference it has made in their lives.
testimonials.quote1: Without this surgery, I wouldn't be able to walk today. Thank you to everyone who donated to help me recover from my injuries.
testimonials.quote2: As a doctor working in northern Syria, the medical supplies we receive through this platform have saved countless lives in our community clinic.
testimonials.quote3: My son needed specialized care that wasn't available locally. This platform connected us with doctors and funded his treatment. He's now recovering well.

volunteer.title: Volunteer With Us
volunteer.subtitle: We're looking for doctors, nurses, paramedics, pharmacists, drivers, translators, field coordinators, and others who want to make a difference. Whether in Syria or remote, your skills are needed!

register.aboutPlaceholder: Briefly describe your organisation and its humanitarian/medical activities.

contributions.title: Organisation Contributions
contributions.description: Submit the medical equipment, tools, or services your organisation is donating or needs. All submissions are reviewed by admin before becoming available to NGOs and cases in need.
contributions.submitDescription: Your contribution of {title} is pending approval.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: SyriaHealthcare.com connects medical professionals and donors to provide critical healthcare to families affected by the ongoing crisis in Syria.
mission.text2: We ensure your donation directly funds medical procedures, supplies, and transportation for patients who would otherwise have no access to care.
mission.text3: Through transparency and accountability, we focus on making the biggest impact possible with every dollar contributed.
mission.donationImpact: of donations go to medical aid

joinMission.title: Join Our Mission Today
joinMission.text: Every donation, no matter how small, contributes to saving lives and providing critical healthcare to those who need it most in Syria.

case1.title: Emergency Surgery for 9-year-old Layla
case1.description: Layla needs urgent surgery following injuries sustained in Aleppo. Your support will help cover surgical costs and essential post-operative care.

case2.title: Dialysis Treatment for Ahmad
case2.description: Ahmad requires ongoing dialysis after kidney failure. Donations cover 6 months of therapy.

case3.title: Medical Supplies for Rural Clinic
case3.description: This clinic in rural Idlib serves over 200 patients weekly. Your donation will provide essential medicines and supplies for three months.
